Articles.Content:
Trying to figure out the fuel transport portion of KAS.     I have the RTF in ships inventory, as well as wrench and screwdriver.   I can attach the RTF to a fuel tank, but
when I try to grab the connection I just get a buzz sound, and nothing happens.    I've tried using the ground base, ground pylon and the joint socket as well with no success.

I have a stranded ship that I wanted to bring fuel to, and I just can't figure this out.

Thanks in advance for any tips.
That sounds like something got missed or corrupted on install.  First thing would be try deleting & reinstalling KAS.
